title: Provides that certain hearings shall be held within twenty days from the filing; repealer
summary: Provides that a hearing shall be held before a workers compensation law judge within twenty days from the filing of an application for hearing accompanied by supporting evidence made by any party in any case, except a case being initially controverted.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to time frames for certain hearings; and to repeal subdivision 2-b of section 25 of the workers' compensation law, relating to conciliation
